tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A very good experience, she explains the root cause and provides appropriate treatment. Would definitely recommend to anyone experiencing allergic reactions.

I recently visited Dr. Shilpa to discuss my severe allergic reaction history, as I was concerned about traveling abroad. She was incredibly helpful and reassuring, explaining all the emergency measures I should take in case of a severe reaction when hospitals may not be readily available in a foreign land. 

Additionally, she provided me with all the necessary documentation to carry my medicines. Thanks to her guidance and support, I now feel confident and less worried about managing my severe allergy while traveling abroad. Thank you, Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Both the doctor as well as the nurse Mrs.Kushalkar were equally cordial and professional. I was able to explain my issues based on which a detailed allergy test was conducted. Subsequent to the outcome of the test, customised medicine would be provided (not immediately. I am told to come and collect or they can courier it) The doc gave a lucid explanation of the diagnosis results and how it can be arrested. She will proceed only once the patient is throughly convinced with the treatment. I can only comment about the outcome once my treatment starts.

I went in for cat dander immunotherapy. The doctor just wanted to give me medication for 3 to 6 months *** **** ***** ******** She said no to giving 1 month medicine to start with. ****** *************** *****

review: I have a complicated medical history and was looking for a doctor who could help me with my condition as well as pending medical decisions. I was diagnosed well and am currently undergoing tests as per doctor's recommendations. The treatment will begin soon. I would recommend her to anyone with a chronic history of allergies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor Shilpa patiently listened to my condition history and provided me the best approach to identify allergy triggers that were causing my condition.
Allergy is a complex problem for any patient to understand but she cleared all my doubts, queries and explained me the Do’s and Dont’s to manage my condition better. Would definitely recommend Dr. Shilpa to anyone who is struggling with Allergies

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Shilpa Nayak was very patient and friendly. Gave enough time to understand my issues and family history. Recommended skin allergy test and post the test explained the way forward. 
I absolutely recommend her for her for the amount of time she spends with you and make sure you leave feeling absolutely safe and taken care of. 
Very positive and amazing attitude for dealing with the allergies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Nayak is very friendly and frank with her patients. She explains the problem in details with practical and recommended solutions to find relief at the earliest. She provides options for treatment to her patients and does a thorough follow up to attain the maximum and best results for her clients.She is highly recommended for all sorts of allergy related problems.

review: She is a amazing Doctor. I have been suffering from urticaria from last 1.5 years checked many doctors , in fact the best in town , but didn’t got any relief. Since then I met her and she explained in a way about my health issue . I m not having medicine since then and episode of urticaria also slowly became lesser. we checked each veg and non veg testing and since then m taking proper diet accordingly. I m very much satisfied . M health improved drastically. All the best Doctor and many Thanks.
